original_text: And they truly were many priests, because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death:
korean_text: 제사장 된 그들의 수효가 많은 것은 죽음으로 말미암아 항상 있지 못함이로되

sentences.original_text: And they truly were many priests
because they were not suffered to continue
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 계속할 수 없었기 때문입니다
